title: Can I become an affiliate?
content:
Grammarly helps people all over the world: students, professionals, job seekers, language learners, and anyone else who is writing in English. While Grammarly’s affiliate program is a natural fit for blogs or websites related to writing, we also have many successful affiliates on our platform whose content is focused on career development, education, technology, or other topics that appeal to Grammarly’s various user segments.
Your chances of being accepted into Grammarly’s affiliate program are highest if you produce content that is relevant to Grammarly’s mission and is well maintained, current, and appropriate.
For more information on how to become an affiliate partner, please visit this page:
https://www.grammarly.com/affiliates
